# [Interview #575: TOM Signing Report - Ted Herman, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=575#7)

#### Question

Where is Bela now?

#### Brandon Sanderson

In the White Tower stable.

#### Harriet McDougal Rigney

Communing with the Dark One!
